title: Lizzy Mendivil
subtitle: Software and Web developer
biography: Systems engineer with experience in software analysis and development for 10 years. Scrum Developer Certified. Solid knowledge in Microsoft Technologies using multilayer architecture. Flexibility and rapid absorption of new techniques and technologies. Committed, self-taught, responsible, proactive and analytical. Diploma in competency-based Higher Education for Science and Technology. Passionate about learning the latest in web and mobile technologies, and of course, Angular lover.
